title: Almond and parsley crumb fish with a roasted red pepper sauce and nibbles
description: A great tapas-style starter if your cooking for friends – or try it as a canapé.
ingredients: 1 x 300g/10½oz cod fillet, pin boned and diced
2 x 100g/3½oz red mullet fillets, pin boned and diced
1 slice sourdough bread, cut into cubes
salt and freshly ground black pepper
